snippet.title: Leshy - Gameplay Teaser (2021)
snippet.description:
➕ Add to wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1601320/Leshy

▶ Watch CINEMATIC TRAILER now: https://youtu.be/6vFjRZei_0s

💬 Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/5k375hu8vw
🔵 Visit Leshy Facebook page: https://facebook.com/leshygame
🌐 Website: https://glivigames.com/projects#leshy
🔵 Facebook page: https://facebook.com/glivigames

📣 We are happy to announce our game - Leshy - third person hack'n'slash where you take the role of a Slavic demon, the guardian of the forest.

Keep in mind that this is an early gameplay footage. The final version may differ from the depicted one.

#Leshy #Leszy #GliviGames #UnrealEngine #Game #Gameplay #Trailer #Teaser
